subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN1813 is on the way
description_text:
Simsonn,

Tracking from this link is no longer available.  Can you check if this has
been handed off to another carrier or something?  Please advise.

Thanks!
Michael Carpenter

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Carpenter,     You can use this link to track it, it has now gone through customs and is expected to arrive for you around the 5th.  https://www.track718.us/en/detail?nums=JSEXT2406723581YQ
